athenaPrompt: Launch once, launch right, no budget burned. Questions?

prompt.text: If you're launching something new and can't afford to get it wrong...

body.text: Launch right the first time. We build your complete go-to-market strategy from positioning to channels to messaging to timeline. Who you're targeting, what you're saying, where you're saying it, and in what sequence. Everything mapped before you spend a pound on execution.

metadata.template: Six weeks beats six months of "let's try this and see." Launch strategy ready by {result}, budget intact.

share.subject: Worth looking at: Go-to-Market Strategy
share.body:
Hey,

I came across this and thought it might help with [ADD_YOUR_CHALLENGE_HERE].

It's a complete go-to-market strategy service. They map everything from positioning to channels to messaging to timeline. Who you're targeting, what you're saying, where, and when. Everything mapped before you spend a pound on execution.

Six weeks, starts at £15,000.

If we talk to them next week, we could have results by {deliveryDate}.

Here's the link: {url}

Worth a conversation?
